title: Bad Ping
body:
Hello,
Its been 2 weeks for now that i have rly bad ping when playing at home.
That never happened to me before when played through my home connection to net..
when playing through other connections my ping is just fine - the thing is that i talked to my
network supplier and they restarted my modem and everything and said there isnt seem to be any problem with my connection.. surfing the net is also fine when doing it at home - it is rly just the ping issue i am having problem with  
i dont know how to solve this thing and am very frustrated by now...

any suggestions?

replies.body: This may not be an issue with your connection itself, but rather the way your connection is being routed to our servers. Let's see how that looks after it leaves you network with this handy [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Grab some network logs from a game that had crazy ping, and let that reader scan it. Take a screenshot and post it here using something like Gyazo so that I can see as well!

Here are 2 network logs analysis from games with high ping, done by the log reader. if u need more tell me please.

1 - https://gyazo.com/11327b9963aafef0d2b5584879cd806b

2 - https://gyazo.com/2129191c40b983ff268445542a3fadd7

Yea that bit of packet loss might be the main problem you're having here. Reach out to our tech guys with those network logs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might be able to see something inside they can adjust to get that ping lowered!
